snippet.title: MXGP 2019 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
For the first time in the series, MXGP 2019 will let you live the thrill of the Championship with all riders, bikes, and teams of the 2019 Season!
Get ready for a challenge that you have never seen before!

MXGP 2019 will be available from August 27th on PlayStation®4, Xbox One and Windows PC®/STEAM. 

Follow us on social networks

FB: https://www.facebook.com/MXGPVideogame/
IG: https://www.instagram.com/mxgpvideogame/
TW: https://twitter.com/MilestoneItaly
